title: CAPE-sandbox signatures
content:
When I submit a PDF file to analyse, it triggers a signature called 
stealth_file
. I just added the alerted path into the whitelist as shown, but it didn't solve the problem. How to resolve it?

comments.text: It would be better if you posted text information as text instead of an image.

answers_data.content:
I solved the issue by restarting the cape-processor.service 
$ sudo systemctl restart cape-processor.service
